db:info.db:title: Qt SCXML Traffic Light QML Example (Static)

db:abstract.db:para: A Qt Quick application that uses a compiled state machine to implement a traffic light.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml scxml CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += trafficlight-qml-static.cpp
RESOURCES += trafficlight-qml-static.qrc
STATECHARTS = ../trafficlight-common/statemachine.scxml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/scxml/trafficlight-qml-static INSTALLS += target
